title: What are the best rap songs that include oldies songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: “ Over a saxophone and bass sample of Tom Scott's cover of "Today" by Jefferson Airplane, CL Smooth unravels fond memories of his own childhood, being the son of a young teenage mother, her father and four siblings, and the love he feels for other family members in working class Mount Vernon. The chorus's ad libs are provided by Pete Rock. The 12 second intro is sampled from the 1971 song "When She Made Me Promise" by The Beginning of the End. The b-side of the 12" pressing is "The Creator", which is taken from the group's 1991 EP, All Souled Out.” They Reminisce Over You (T.R.O.Y.) - Wikipedia

Few of my favorites: Eminem - Sing for a Moment (contains sample from Aerosmith's "Dream On")  Run DMC feat Aerosmith: Walk this way  Eminem - Going through changes (contains sample from Black Sabbath - Changes)   Find many more such songs here:Rap Rock Tracks Using Samples
